Clip.Title: VENOM ISLANDS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: On a string of Southern Indonesian islands, poisonous predators lurk, each with its own toxic cocktail suited to its hunting style. Some bite. Some sting. Some strike quickly, while others deliver their own slow brand of death.

Clip.Title: WANTED ANACONDA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Find out the truth behind the myths of anacondas as a crew of wildlife photographers and biologists sets out on a mission of fact and fiction.

Clip.Title: FACING THE GIANT BEES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In Nepal, men risk their lives in search of honey, the golden liquid valued since the dawn of time: honey. But to reach the treasure, they must confront the giant bees, the largest bee in the world with a potentially fatal sting.

Clip.Title: WOMEN AMONG WOLVES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: This is a story of one woman's passion for wolves. Gudrun Pflueger is an ex world champion cross country skier and long distance runner who is on the search for the coast wolves of British Columbia.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The west coast of Newfoundland is a story of cultural history and beauty - from the first European settlements at l'Anse aux Meadows and Port au Choix, to the incredible, scenic beauty of Gros Morne National Park.

Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: BEER IS CHEAPER THAN THERAPY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Kill 30 people and you're a serial killer. But do it in war and you're a hero. This documentary examines the mental health crisis in US soldiers returning from deployment who suffer from depression, alcoholism, and alarming rates of suicide.

Clip.Title: IRELAND'S NAZIS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: This extraordinary one hour documentary special investigates the cases of high-ranking Nazis who sought refuge in post-war neutral Ireland.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: BC's Northern, Coastal Boundary is an epic, high-altitude journey, from Seven Sisters Provincial Park, to Salmon Glacier, and the mountains of the Yellowhead highway.

Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From its Great Lakes to its Grand Canyon, its Rocky Mountain peaks to its Key West reefs, America is a land of amazing destinations. This aerial adventure over the nation's most remarkable landscapes and landmarks captures the breathtaking beauty of America, while demonstrating how its sense of wonder has inspired countless artists, thinkers, and revolutionaries.

Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From its Great Lakes to its Grand Canyon, its Rocky Mountain peaks to its Key West reefs, America is a land of amazing destinations. This aerial adventure over the nation's most remarkable landscapes and landmarks captures the breathtaking beauty of America, while demonstrating how its sense of wonder has inspired countless artists, thinkers, and revolutionaries.

Clip.Title: SPACE VOYAGES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: NASA is sizing up a new but familiar challenge: how to transport humans back into deep space - to the moon, to Mars, to asteroids, and beyond. New destinations require new hardware - more powerful rockets and radical new landing modules. Venture back to our early space adventures with Buzz Aldrin, Jim Lovell and NASA experts and learn about the successes and failures of the Apollo missions. Follow today's technicians as they reach for the stars by learning from these lessons of the past.
